title: Crashing Legacy Client (Help needed)
body:
I have been having a hard time with the client recently. After every 2-3 games the next time I'm  in champ select, my client will crash. This gives me a LeaverBuster which is really agitating and I just want to know if there is a way to prevent this from occurring. I am not asking to get this fixed I just would like to know if there is a way to prevent this without restarting my client every game.

I do have my graphic drivers up to date
I have a Nvidia GTX650
I have reinstalled League 
No custom skins or anything like that

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select are typically caused by your client dropping its connection to the matchmaking servers. Hop on our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and check out our common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if that guide resolved this issue.
Does it also have to deal with visual glitches? I forgot to mention that. I'll be in champ select and my client will glitch half of the textures off of my client.

I've never of visual issues caused by connection problems outside of Black Screens, but it's a good starting point nonetheless.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
